1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are hosting a New Year's party. So the
place is crowded and in a shameless promotion for NBC they're watching Jay Leno's coverage
of New Year's from Time Square.

lines.Line:
(On TV to Dick Clark) Is there any entertainment there? What are people
doing
All right! Here we go! 1999! The year of Joey
(deadpan, standing next to Monica) We're very happy for you

We wanted to kiss at midnight, but nobody else is going to so
y'know
All right, I'll take care of it
All right, I'll take care of it

lines.Character:
(They try to stop him, not sure of what he's planning. He ignores them and goes to talk
to Ross
lines.Line:
They try to stop him, not sure of what he's planning. He ignores them and goes to talk
to Ross.

Ross! Ross! Ross, listen! Who are you kissing at midnight, huh? Rachel or
Phoebe
Well you gotta kiss someone, you can't kiss your sister
Well, who's gonna kiss my sister
Well, who's gonna kiss my sister
Dude-dude, who would you rather have kiss your sister, me or Chandler
Oh well, since I have that whole history with Rachel, I guess Phoebe
Pheebs! Pheebs! Ross wants to kiss you at midnight
It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask
It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask
Rach! Rach! Listen, I'm gonna kiss you at midnight

Well, everyone's gotta kiss someone. You can't kiss Ross you got the
history
So? Who would you rather have kiss you, me or Chandler
(watching the ball drop) 3! 2! 1! HAPPY NEW YEAR!

lines.Character:
(And with that everyone starts playing tonsil hockey. Chandler with Monica, Ross with
Phoebe, and Joey with Rachel
lines.Line:
And with that everyone starts playing tonsil hockey. Chandler with Monica, Ross with
Phoebe, and Joey with Rachel.
So did that do anything for ya
So did that do anything for ya

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Ross is talking to a beautiful woman as Chandler and Joey enter.

lines.Line: Okay! (She leaves.) (To Chandler and Joey.) Hey
I just asked that girl out
I just asked that girl out
Nice!! Yeah! Is that part of your resolution, your new thing for today

Yes it is. See. (Shows them the piece of paper she gave him with her name
and phone number on it.
You all right Chandler? Is there something funny about that name

No. No, I just think that maybe I-I'd heard it somewhere before. (Sits
down rubbing his temple.

Oh really! Where? Somewhere funny I'd bet! (Chandler is straining to keep
quiet as Phoebe enters.

Oh-oh, guess what? I-I have a date with Elizabeth (Talking into Chandler's
ear.) Hornswoggle
Hornswoggle? (To Chandler) Ooh, this must be killing you
See ya! All right Pheebs, I am ready for my first lesson.

Okay. (Joey tries to take the guitar.) Oh no-no-no, you don't touch the
guitar! First you learn here, (Points to her head.) then you learn here. (Points to the
guitar.

Okay, lesson one: chords. Now, I don't know the actual names of the
chords but umm, I-I-I made up names for the way my hand looks while I'm doing them. (She
starts to show Joey the chords. Transcribers Note: For this one you'll have to use your
imagination, 'cause it would take me 50 pages to describe each one. So if you want to see
them, you'll have to wait for this episode to come to a TV near you.) (Holding up her hand
and then reconfiguring her hand with each name.) So then, this is Bear Claw. Okay, umm,
Turkey Leg and Old Lady. (Joey tries to imitate them.

What an interesting approach to guitar instruction. Y'know some might
find it amusing, I myself find it regular

3.SceneDescription:
Elizabeth Hornswoggle's apartment; Ross is there on his date with her. They are
sitting on the couch watching a movie. Ross is obviously hot.

lines.Line:
(talking to himself) My God! These pants are burning up! (He's still
wearing the leather pants.) (She snuggles closer.) Oh come on, she wants to snuggle now!
What is she trying to kill me? It's like a volcano in here! (Out loud.) Are you hot?
Okay, it must just be me then
Okay, it must just be me then

lines.Character:
(He shifts on the couch and a ripping sound emanates from his lower regions, the sound
reminds one of a brief explosion of gas. In other words, it sounds like he farted. She has
a look of horrific wonderment, wondering

lines.Line:
That was just the pants on the couch. Umm, hey, do you, do you mind if I
use your bathroom

Thanks. (Gets up and as he does so, the sound returns. Without another
word he heads into her bathroom.

lines.Character:
[Cut to Elizabeth Hornswoggle's bathroom, Ross frantically pulls his shirt out and
drops his pants. He exhales in sheer ecstasy as the coolness of the bathroom envelops his
legs. He sits on the cast iron bathtub, again gasping in pleasure. He next grabs a
magazine and starts to blow air on his exposed legs, but that doesn't work the way he
wants it to. So he throws the magazine down, looks around for another idea, and finds one.
He jumps up and hops to the sink. He turns on the water and starts to splash some on his
legs, cooling them further
lines.Line:
Cut to Elizabeth Hornswoggle's bathroom, Ross frantically pulls his shirt out and
drops his pants. He exhales in sheer ecstasy as the coolness of the bathroom envelops his
legs. He sits on the cast iron bathtub, again gasping in pleasure. He next grabs a

He jumps up and hops to the sink. He turns on the water and starts to splash some on his
legs, cooling them further.
(yelling from outside) Hey, my favorite part is coming up

lines.Character:
(He goes to pull up his pants, but can't seem to get them past his knees. He
frantically tries to pull them up to no avail. Panic sets in
lines.Line:
He goes to pull up his pants, but can't seem to get them past his knees. He
frantically tries to pull them up to no avail. Panic sets in.

4.SceneDescription: Chandler, Joey, and Ross's, The phone rings and Joey answers it.

lines.Line: (calling from Elizabeth's bathroom) Joey, it's Ross! I need some help

No, I-I got really hot in my leather pants so I took them off but they
must have shrunk from the-the sweat or-or-or my legs expanded from the heat. Look, I-I
can't put them back on. I can't
Oh. That is quite a situation. Uh, do you see any like, powder
Powder! Yeah! Yeah, I have powder! (Grabs some of her shelf.)

Good-good, okay, sprinkle some of that on your legs, it'll absorb some of
the moisture and then you can get your pants back up

Yeah, okay, hold on! (He puts the phone down and proceeds to spread a
large amount of powder on his legs and makes another attempt at pulling up his pants. It
doesn't work, and without picking up the phone leans down to it.) (Almost in tears.)
They're not coming on man
Ohh, I-I see lotion, I have lotion! Will that work
Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there
Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there

lines.Character:
(Ross proceeds to apply copious amounts of the lotion on his legs. He literally starts
spraying the back of his legs with the lotion, and as he applies some to his butt he makes
a happy face like he enjoyed that sensation. After using about half the bottle he again
tries to pull up his pants, but at the first sign of resistance, his hand slips off of the
pants and hits him in the forehead
lines.Line:
Ross proceeds to apply copious amounts of the lotion on his legs. He literally starts
spraying the back of his legs with the lotion, and as he applies some to his butt he makes
a happy face like he enjoyed that sensation. After using about half the bottle he again
tries to pull up his pants, but at the first sign of resistance, his hand slips off of the

They're still, they're still not coming on man and the lotion and the
powder have made a paste
Really?! Uhh, what color is it
Really?! Uhh, what color is it

Well, I'm just—if the paste matches the pants, you can make yourself
a pair of paste pants and she won't know the difference
(entering) Joey, do you have a minute
(entering) Joey, do you have a minute

(To Ross) Uh, Rachel's here, so good luck man, let me know how it works
out. (He hangs up the phone and strands Ross in the bathroom.
Oh, Joey, I have such a problem
Oh, Joey, I have such a problem

Oh well, you're timing couldn't be better. I am putting out fires all over
the place
Okay. Okay. Okay. Joey, I have got to tell you something
What-what is it, what is it
What-what is it, what is it
What-what is it, what is it

Oh my God, it's so huge, but you just have to promise me that you cannot
tell anyone
Oh no, no-no-no-no! I don't want to know
Yes! Yes! Yes, you do want to know! This is unbelievable

I don't care, Rach! Look, I am tired of being the guy who knows all the
secrets but can't tell anyone
What? What secrets? You know secrets? What are they
What? What secrets? You know secrets? What are they
And you're not supposed to be gossiping!!
And you're not supposed to be gossiping!!

I know, I know! I just can't keep this one in, so I pick up the
phone… (Joey in a childish attempt to not hear what Rachel is about to say, puts his
fingers in his ears and starts to scream loudly. Rachel turns and walks out upon seeing
that Joey's not gonna listen, and as she exits Chandler walks in and sees Joey in his
current state.

lines.Character:
(Chandler seeing that Joey has his eyes closed sneaks over and picks up the chicken.
The chicken starts flapping it's wings in protest as Chandler holds the chicken inches
from Joey's face. Joey stops yelling and upon opening his eyes sees the chicken, screams,
and falls to the ground in horror
lines.Line:
Chandler seeing that Joey has his eyes closed sneaks over and picks up the chicken.
The chicken starts flapping it's wings in protest as Chandler holds the chicken inches
from Joey's face. Joey stops yelling and upon opening his eyes sees the chicken, screams,
and falls to the ground in horror.

5.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is there to apologize to Phoebe.

lines.Line: No, I can't talk to you! I don't have a fancy ad in the Yellow Pages

Look, Pheebs, I just, I wanna apologize for, for saying that your method
was stupid and-and maybe ask you to be my teacher again. And-and I promise, I won't touch
a guitar until you say I'm ready. (After a short pause she hands him her guitar.) You
really think I'm ready

Wow! Cool! (He takes the guitar, stands up, and goes to play a note.
However, while strumming it, he knocks it out of his hands and it bounces off the table
and lands on the floor. Phoebe just stares at the guitar.
(sitting back down) Was the chord at least right

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe, Ross, and Monica are there.

lines.Line: (entering) Oh good, okay, I can't take it anymore. I can't take it anymore. So you win, okay? Here! (Hands him the 50 bucks he's about to owe him.) Pheebs? Flying a jet? Better make it a spaceship so that you can get back to your home planet! And Ross, phone call for you today, Tom Jones, he wants his pants back! And Hornswoggle? What are you dating a character from Fraggile Rock?! (He sits down and sighs in relief.
